Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Receives National Recognition | Lake Nona Find a Home Find a Home Buy a Home Rent an Apartment Things to Do Life & Culture Events Hotels & Venues Town Center Commercial Resources About Lake Nona Lake Nona Map Laureate Park Map Contact News Blog Press Releases News Coverage Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Receives National Recognition Lake Nona Golf & Country Club receives recognition as one of the top private golf club communities BY EDITORIAL TEAM Dec 3, 2018 SHARE Lake Nona Golf & Country Club receives recognition as one of the top private golf club communities Lake Nona Golf & Country Club , one of the world’s top private golf club communities, has once again earned the distinguished recognition as a Platinum Club® of America, advancing five positions to rank #37 in the country. Platinum Club® of America status, as determined by Club Leaders Forum, one of the most respected sources for club industry leaders and professionals, represents the upper 5 percent of America’s top private clubs of excellence. Conducted every two years, the ranking is determined by over 3,000 industry professionals (general managers, owners and presidents) using the following criteria to establish the benchmark of excellence: universal recognition, amenities and facilities, professional service levels, overall experience, governance and management, and adapting to changing times. Lake Nona Golf & Country Club was also selected as “Best Local Golf Course” by the Orlando Business Journal 2018 Readers’ Choice Awards, a list determined by OBJ readers. Lake Nona Golf & Country Club General Manager Ryan Spence credits the Club’s ongoing success and recognition with their ability to innovate and elevate experiences for its members and guests. By offering superlative amenities, exceptional family experiences and outstanding service, Lake Nona Golf & Country Club has delivered the highest quality of living in Central Florida for more than 30 years where a vibrant, international population of members and residents enjoy an active lifestyle comprised of wellness, education, recreation and entertainment. Click here to learn more about Lake Nona Golf & Country Club, a cornerstone of our growing community. The Workshop at Lake Nona | Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Skip to main content About Real Estate Available Luxury Properties Lake Nona Realty Custom Builders Cromwell at Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Golf Golf Programs and Services The Workshop at Lake Nona Hole by Hole Membership Amenities Amenities Club Expansion & Renovation Events Events Venue Event Request Contact Us Accessible Mode Language English Chinese Spanish Portugese Hindi Arabic English EspaÃ±ol PortuguÃªs About Real Estate Available Luxury Properties Lake Nona Realty Custom Builders Cromwell at Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Golf Golf Programs and Services The Workshop at Lake Nona Hole by Hole Membership Amenities Amenities Club Expansion & Renovation Events Events Venue Event Request Contact Us Accessible Mode Language English Chinese Spanish Portugese Hindi Arabic English EspaÃ±ol PortuguÃªs The Workshop at Lake Nona One of the most outfitted golf performance facilities in the country, The Workshop at Lake Nona is designed to provide a comprehensive training experience for players of all levels, from novice to touring professionals. Contact The Workshop A Facility Like No Other Fully equipped with the best high-tech golf instructional tools on the market, The Workshop provides an unrivaled teaching and coaching experience, complete with: Two Hitting Bays Video Teaching Equipment & Launch Monitors Swing Catalyst Duel Force Plate & Zen Green Stage Bull 3D Capture System SAM Putt Lab Studio Retail Space Club Fitting & Repair Workshop Club Fitting & Repair Lake Nona’s custom club fitting experience is a fun, interactive session to determine your golf equipment needs. Our Director of Club Fitting & Building, Taylor Fulbright, will guide you through the custom fitting system, utilizing a universal adapter to allow golfers to demo a variety of club brands, and will then provide an analysis and advice on the best product to match your game. Our club repair workshop has multiple stations with best in class equipment, allowing our staff to perform the following services: Build custom clubs Re-shaft, re-grip, and repair clubs Loft and lie adjustment CALL 407.209.1251 VISIT LAKE NONA PUBLICATIONS Lake Nona Publications About Real Estate Golf Membership Employment Contact Us Legal Accessibility Fair Housing © Lake Nona Property Holdings, LLC, All rights reserved. The Soho Collection is a limited offering of new construction residences ranging from 3,800 to 7,000 square feet, located throughout the community. Tennis | Lake Nona Member Skip to Main Content Calendar All Events 3-Day Outlook Weekly Calendars Golf Linear Calendar Club News All Club News Club Accolades Gallery Golf Golf Policies The Workshop at Lake Nona Ladies’ Golf Isleworth Benefits Amenities All Amenities Dining Tennis Fitness Nona Crew Lake Nona Performance Club Lodge Weddings & Events Lake Nona Ladies’ Association Real Estate Community Personal Watercrafts Security Residential Services Contact All Contact Our Team Member Login Tennis Created with Sketch. OPEN DAILY 7:00 a.m. – 9:00 p.m. Contact Staff Adult Tennis Ladies’ Gold Clinic Mondays, 9:00 – 10:30 a.m. This player has a USTA 4.0 ranking or above.  Emphasis is on court positioning and doubles strategy. Clinic Fee: $30 Cardio Tennis – RESUMES SEPT. 2023 Mondays & Wednesdays, 10:30 – 11:30 a.m. Tuesdays, 6 :00 – 7:00 p.m. Power Tennis is more about moving and being active, and less about form and technique. With upbeat music and different point situations, your heart rate will raise and put you in a good aerobic zone. Clinic Fee: $20 Intermediate “Stroke of the Week” Clinic Wednesdays, 9 :00 – 10:30 a.m. Adult Tennis Clinic is designed for both men and women players with prior tennis experience or players who wish to add another practice session.  This class consists of a sixty minute drills clinic followed by a half an hour of singles or doubles play. Clinic Fee: $30 Beginner/Intermediate “Stroke of the Week” Clinic Fridays, 9:00 – 10:30 a.m. Adult Tennis Clinic is designed for both men and women players with prior tennis experience, beginners or players who wish to add another practice session. This class consists of a sixty minute drills clinic followed by a half an hour of singles or doubles play. Clinic Fee: $30 *Please RSVP 24 hours in advance, as adult clinics require a minimum of three players. CLICK HERE TO REGISTER Junior Tennis Quick Start Junior Tennis Saturdays, 9:00 – 11:30 a.m. A junior tennis program designed to teach basic skills and principles of the game through eye-hand coordination drills and fun games. AGES 3-4      9:00 – 9:30 a.m. AGES 5-7      9:30 – 10:30 a.m. AGES 8-10   10:30 – 11:30 a.m. Fee: $10 (ages 3-4); $20 (ages 5-10) RESUMES AUGUST 14: Juniors Beginner Clinic (Ages 7 – 10) Mondays and Wednesdays, 4:00 – 5:00 p.m. This class introduces the beginner to basic stroke production, movement, sportsmanship, games and scoring. Clinic Fee: $20 Juniors Intermediate/Advanced Clinic (Ages 11 – 17) Tuesdays and Thursdays , 4:00 – 5:00 p.m. The intermediate/advanced class is designed for the serious junior player.  The program covers development of specific tactics and strategies depending on style of play, match-play skills and conditioning. Clinic Fee: $20 Upcoming Events View Events View News Junior Tennis Thu - Sep, 11 View Details Junior Tennis Thu - Sep, 11 View Details Pickleball Open Play Thu - Sep, 11 View Details Paddle & Play Pickleball Social Fri - Sep, 12 View Details Junior Quick Start Tennis Sat - Sep, 13 View Details Pickleball Open Play Sun - Sep, 14 View Details Beginner/Intermediate Adult Tennis Clinic Mon - Sep, 15 View Details Junior Tennis Mon - Sep, 15 View Details Junior Tennis Mon - Sep, 15 View Details Created with Sketch. Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Tournaments Who's who Dictionary News Tournaments Who's who Dictionary News Find a course: Americas Europe Africa/ME Asia Oceania Overview Learn more Lake Nona Golf & Country Club 9100 Chiltern Drive, Orlando, Florida 32827 Office +1 (407) 859 3402 Pro shop +1 (407) 857 6216 Fax +1 (407) 857 1642 Email Email the course Website Visit website About the course The Course: 18 holes. Tree-lined parkland. Relatively flat terrain - easy to walk. Surroundings: Woodland, high-end residential and lakeside (one hole directly lakeside on each of Lake Nona, Red Lake and Buck Lake). Designer: Tom Fazio Back tees Club tees Front tees Yards 7215 6366 5389 Par 72 72 72 SSS or slope 74.1 Location Latitude: 28.415428 Longitude: -81.261621 How to get there: 15 mi SE of downtown Orlando. Americas / Orlando / Lake Nona Lake Nona Golf & Country Club Est. 1986 Lake Nona Golf & Country Club is home to a championship golf course that ranks with some of the best in Florida. This tree-lined parkland layout provides a wonderful test for your all-round game, with many attractive, skilfully crafted and challenging holes to enjoy. However, this is a private course generally playable only by members and their guests. List of courses: Around Orlando Map of courses: Around Orlando Visitors Who can play and when? Lake Nona is a private club. Guests may only play if hosted by a member. Green fees Outside visitor fee not applicable; private course for members and their guests. Other information Walking permitted. Practice facilities Excellent Did you know? Lake Nona has played host to the annual Tavistock Cup competition, as well as the prestigious Solheim Cup (see our Tournaments section >by Venue > Isleworth). | Lake Nona is a Tavistock Group property, making it part of a diversified business conglomerate founded by British businessman Joe Lewis, the current owner of Tottenham Hotspur Football Club. Published ranking Florida 's 53rd best course (Golf Digest, 2023/24). World 's former 95th best course (GOLF magazine, 1995; not in subsequent editions of this ranking). Find a course By country/region AMERICAS EUROPE AFRICA/ME ASIA OCEANIA By city AMERICAS EUROPE AFRICA/ME ASIA OCEANIA Or Search by maps Tournaments Women’s (British) Open : the last women’s major championship of the season is hosted by Royal Porthcawl GC . It’s the first time this fabulous seaside links course has hosted the event (July 31-Aug 3). Walker Cup : the 50th playing of this prestigious men’s amateur event sees the GB&I go head-to-head against the defending USA team at Cypress Point Club , California (Sept 6-7). After that, all eyes turn to Bethpage State Park on Long Island, NY , where the American and defending European professional teams engage in the 45th Ryder Cup (Sept 27-29). Who's Who Lottie Woad : 21-year-old Woad burst onto the professional scene in July, with wins in the Women’s Irish Open (as an amateur) and three weeks later in the Women’s Scottish Open (as a professional). She nearly picked-up a major championship, placing third in The Evian in the same month. Pádraig Harrington : the ever-likeable Irishman added the (British) Senior Open Championship title to his stellar array of tournament successes. His win came on Sunningdale’s spectacular Old Course. Harrington had already bagged the U.S. Senior Open title in June this year. The Dutch GC, The Netherlands The Dutch : "It's no' just a game", as they say in Scotland, and that's certainly true at The Dutch. With 5-star services throughout, a lavishly comfortable Loch Lomond -inspired clubhouse, and a superbly designed and presented golf course, one could not ask for more from this top-end private club. Join us at The Dutch from August 21–24 for the Festival of Golf, featuring the HotelPlanner Tour . Experience four days of top-tier sport, live music, incredible food, and unexpected surprises. Explore the grounds, connect with others, embrace new challenges, and dive into an unforgettable celebration. Click here to buy tickets . Prince's Golf Club, Kent (UK) Here at Prince’s Golf Club you'll find 27 excellent holes of links golf. Just over the fence and sharing similar terrain is Royal St George’s; but Prince’s is far from overshadowed by its venerable neighbour. The three nine-hole loops at Prince's, laid out over gently undulating terrain, are sure to bring a smile of satisfaction to all lovers of links golf. Stay&Play at Prince's : excellent onsite Lodge accommodation available Popular videos You can subscribe to the Where2Golf channel on YT if you like to see more video content. You'll find a "Subscribe" button on any of our YouTube videos. Or if you want a quick and direct access subscribe here . Once done, any new published videos will show up in your Subscriptions feed. Bethpage State Park (New York) host of the Ryder Cup 2025 Whistling Straits (Wisconsin, US) TPC Louisiana host of the Zurich Classic of New Orleans To receive updates on golf courses and destinations uncovered sign up for our monthly newsletter. About us / Contact Ratings & Definitions Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Follow Copyright © 2025 where2golf.com. All rights reserved.

PRIVACY POLICY OF LAKENONA.CLUB Lake Nona Property Holdings, LLC and its affiliates (collectively referred to as “Lake Nona”) respect your privacy. We strive to use information to provide the best possible service while respecting the confidentiality of information we are entrusted with. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we may receive or collect when you use our services, as well as some of the methods we use to safeguard your personal information. COLLECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION AND COOKIES We may from time to time collect personal information in order to understand your specific needs and serve you better. Personal information is information about you that is personally identifiable, such as your name, address, email address, or phone number. Lake Nona may use cookies and other technologies to enhance your online experience and to learn about how you use our website and services. A “cookie” is a small file containing a string of characters that uniquely identifies your browser. While most browsers accept cookies by default, you can manually set your browser to refuse all cookies, accept cookies from specific websites, or highlight when a cookie is sent to your browser. Lake Nona’s servers may also automatically record information when you visit our website, including the URL that directed you to our website, your IP address, browser type and the date and time of your visit. There are two main types of cookies: Session cookies: These are temporary cookies that expire at the end of a browser session (when you leave the site). Session cookies allow the website to recognize you as you navigate between pages during a single browser session and allow you to use the website most efficiently. Persistent cookies: In contrast to session cookies, persistent cookies are stored on your equipment between browsing sessions until expiration or deletion. They enable the website to “recognize” you upon your return. We may use session cookies to: Help us maintain security and verify your details as you use our website. We may use persistent cookies to: Collect and compile anonymous, aggregated information for statistical and evaluation purposes to help us understand how users use the website and help us improve our website. In addition to cookies which send information to us, we may also use cookies which collect information and send it to third parties. An example of this is Google Analytics. Please check any relevant third-party website for more information about its use of cookies which may differ from ours. Most browsers are initially set to accept cookies. However, you have the ability to disable cookies if you wish, generally through changing your internet browser settings. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION The information Lake Nona collects is used to comprehensively understand your needs and interests, and permit Lake Nona to deliver a more consistent and personalized experience. For example, Lake Nona may use your information to: communicate with you about products and services; provide service and support; update you about new services; provide personalized promotional offers; select content to be communicated to you; and contact you for market research regarding Lake Nona’s services. Your information may be aggregated with other clients’ information on a purely non-identifiable basis to understand how our products and services are used. CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS AND PRIVACY The California Online Privacy Protection Act applies to residents of California. California residents may request to review and request changes to information collected.  To request this type of information, please contact us at the address or email listed in the Contact Us paragraph below. GLOBAL DATA PROTECTION REGULATION (GDPR) AND PRIVACY The GDPR applies to residents of Europe. In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to request from us any personal information we have retained about you and the right to request we delete that information and stop sending you communications, or that we correct any personal information that you believe is not accurate.  Please contact us about your personal information at realty@lakenona.com . By submitting your personal information to us, you agree to the transfer, storage, use and processing of your personal information outside the country of your residence, including the U.S. POLICY ON SHARING YOUR INFORMATION Lake Nona will not sell, rent or lease your personal information to others.  Lake Nona may share personal information with companies working on our behalf and Lake Nona affiliate entities for the purposes detailed above. In any such cases, however, we require that the companies or entities adhere to privacy standards and policies at least as restrictive as those Lake Nona has in place. Circumstances may arise, whether for strategic or other business reasons, in which Lake Nona decides to sell, buy, merge or otherwise reorganize businesses in various countries. Such a transaction may involve the disclosure of personal information to prospective or actual purchasers, or, conversely, the receipt of such personal information from sellers. It is Lake Nona’s established practice to seek appropriate protection for all personal information in advance of any such transaction. We may make use of your information when we have a good faith belief that access, use, preservation or disclosure of such information is reasonably necessary to: (a) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or legitimate governmental request, (b) detect, prevent, or otherwise address suspected fraud, security or technical issues, (c) enforce any applicable Terms and Conditions, including investigation of potential violations thereof, or (d) protect against imminent harm to the rights, property or safety of Lake Nona, its users or the general public as required or permitted by law. SITES COVERED BY THIS PRIVACY POLICY The Lake Nona website (www.LakeNona.club) may from time-to-time link to third-party websites for your convenience and to provide easy access to additional useful information. Should you select such a link, you will leave the Lake Nona website. Lake Nona does not control these sites nor their privacy practices, which may differ from Lake Nona’s practices and policies. Any personal data you choose to provide to or that is collected by such third parties is not in any way covered by the Privacy Policy of LakeNona.club. We recommend that you read over such website’s privacy policy before providing any personal information. A link to another website from LakeNona.club does not constitute an endorsement or representation about the value, quality or usefulness of anything found on that third-party website. ACCESS TO AND ACCURACY OF YOUR INFORMATION Lake Nona strives to keep your personal information accurate and up-to-date. Toward this goal we may utilize various technologies, management processes and policies. As part of our overall data accuracy initiative, Lake Nona provides you with reasonable access to your personal information so you may review and correct your information if needed. To safeguard your privacy and security, we may verify your identity through various means, such as by requiring a password and user ID, before granting access to your data, if applicable.  We ask that you update your information as and when it changes so any information used to serve you remains as accurate as possible. KEEPING YOUR INFORMATION SECURE Lake Nona values your trust and takes it seriously. To prevent unauthorized access and disclosure, to maintain data accuracy, and to ensure the appropriate use of your information, Lake Nona utilizes industry standard physical, technical and administrative procedures to safeguard any personal information we may collect. CHANGES TO THIS POLICY The effective date of this policy is May 25, 2018.  However, the world of technology changes quickly. If and when there are future changes to our Privacy Policy, we will post them at www.LakeNona.club/privacy-policy. CONTACT US We value your opinions and suggestions.
